targets.query: SELECT mean("op_watt") AS "Usage" FROM "JNK0CA30GE" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("op_watt") AS "Usage" FROM "JNK0CA30GE" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m)
SELECT mean("op_watt") AS "Usage" FROM "JNK0CA30GE" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("op_watt") AS "Usage" FROM "JNK0CA30GE" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(previous)
SELECT bat_Volt AS "Battery Voltage" FROM "JNK0CA30GE" WHERE $timeFilter
